channel.title: How Do I Change Difficulty of Advancing Levels?
channel.description: I dont want advancing levels on my server too easy, so I want to make it harder to advance levels. But how do I do that? And also, how easy should it be to advance a level? If new people come, they dont want it too hard cause they dont want it to take long and they want to be good. But if its pretty hard, people will play longer and it will be more of an accomplishment when you are a high level. So please tell me how to change the difficulty of advancing levels and how hard it should be to advance levels in your opinion. Thank you.

item.title: How Do I Change Difficulty of Advancing Levels?
item.dc:creator: @_Rune_Realm ~Rune Realm
item.description:
@_Rune_Realm wrote:

The method addSkillXP(amount, skill), adds XP to the player’s stats. Find

addSkillXP(

Next to the bracket is the amount and the skill it’s adding to. So i.e after you cut a tree you get 1000 exp, you would find

addSkillXP(1000, 8);

and change 1000 to whatever you want.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change Difficulty of Advancing Levels?
